title: Cannot save datalad subdataset - "index file smaller than expected"
body:
#### What is the problem? I am using datalad in a setup with multiple nested subdatasets within a superdataset for the processing of neuroimaging data on a HPC. In doing so, I try to adhere to the datalad handbook (http://handbook.datalad.org/en/latest/beyond_basics/101-171-enki.html) and some posts on neurostars. Essentially the directory hierarchy looks like root |-code |-envs |-data* |-smriprep |-sub-XYZ \* only data/ is a pure directory the rest are datalad datasets It's the second time I am facing an error. This time it occured during executing "datalad save" within the smriprep subdataset preventing me from saving it. Last time it occured while trying to merge results to a subdataset for freesurfer outputs. ´ Total: 0%| | 0.00/1.00 [00:39 datalad wtf
